channel.description: Recent content in Google Cloud Platform on

item.title: REST API aplication on Google Cloud Platform
item.description: The project presents a REST API aplication developed in Python and Flask that was created to retrieve data about books from a SQLite3 database: https://github.com/cpatrickalves/simple-flask-api A REST API exposes the functionalities of an application or a database through a set of endpoints (URL addresses). These URLs are accessed by clients such as web, mobile apps, or other web services to perform CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) or other actions using HTTP requests.
